overview: William Fawl, a downtrodden high school teenager with a troubled past, is sucked into a world of fear when a mysterious horrific creature begins to follow him after a near brush with death. William's world becomes a macabre spiral of murder and self-mutilation as he digs further into his mind to find the truth behind the creature and his own waking nightmares.
tagline: It Hurts Less If You Smile
title: Run for Your Life
